abstract: Federal Aviation Admin approves plan to expand Powder River Training Complex for bombers over 35,000 square miles of Northern Plains, despite concerns that expansion may disrupt civilian flights or damage rural economies.
lead_paragraph: A proposal to establish an enormous bomber training area over the Northern Plains that advocates say will improve military training and save money got final approval Tuesday.
snippet: A proposal to establish an enormous bomber training area over the Northern Plains that advocates say will improve military training and save money got final approval Tuesday.
